Hi....Thx for the game....i have just one question.....can you play multiplayer with this one?

All guys who have probs with no fullscreen.. You can do 2 things.
1) go to your root folder and open 'GraphicsSettings'.. not the exe but the configuration file.. when you open it search for fullscreen and change the 0 in 1.
2) Or the easiest thing that works for almost every game: just see the game screen is active and then press alt+enter.. it will toglle to full screen
